Entities.Name: Diagnosis of cancer (HCC)
Entities.Definition: Identification of hepatocellular carcinoma, including status such as confirmed, suspected, and no evidence of finding.

Sample Data.Sentence: The pathology report confirmed the presence of hepatocellular carcinoma.
Sample Data.Annotated: Diagnosis of cancer: confirmed hepatocellular carcinoma

Entities.Name: Staging (BCLC)
Entities.Definition: Barcelona Clinic Liver Cancer staging used to determine the extent of the cancer.

Sample Data.Sentence: Patient is classified under BCLC stage B.

Entities.Name: Tumor Information
Entities.Definition: Details about the tumor including location, size, and quantity.

Sample Data.Sentence: Liver tumor at segment 8 measuring 2 cm in diameter.
Sample Data.Annotated: Tumor location: segment 8, Tumor size: 2 cm

Entities.Name: Comorbidity Diagnosis
Entities.Definition: Identification of other significant illnesses present in the patient such as cirrhosis.

Entities.Name: Treatment Information
Entities.Definition: Details regarding treatments administered such as type and status of the treatment.

Sample Data.Sentence: Underwent radiofrequency ablation as a part of treatment plan.

Entities.Name: Recurrent Status
Entities.Definition: Information on whether the cancer has recurred post treatment.

Sample Data.Sentence: No evidence of recurrence post the initial treatment.

Dataset.Name: Narrative reports from National Taiwan University Hospital
Dataset.Details: Contains a mix of clinical report types such as ultrasound, radiology, pathology, and operation notes from liver cancer patients.

Annotation Guidelines.Description: Annotations were made based on regular expressions matching the expressions of concepts. Each concept had its set of related concepts for specifying relevant information such as temporal information and report type.
